title: The world is waiting so let's stop the delaying tactics, games and excuses
text:
Super Saturday could have been the day MPs finally implemented the referendum result, opening the door to a bright new future for our country. Instead, it was another damp squib in a series of many for this zombie parliament. This is so frustrating as we are primed to unleash opportunity for every corner of our country and open up a new trade drive on the world stage.

Against the odds, the Prime Minister has secured a great new deal with Brussels that will allow us to make a success of leaving the European Union without any further pointless delays on 31 October. It gives us control over our domestic economic agenda, the freedom for the whole UK to forge new relationships with the rest of the...
description: Super Saturday could have been the day MPs finally implemented the referendum result, opening the door to a bright new future for our country.
